name: tm61
effect: Teaches Will-O-Wisp to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Will-O-Wisp to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user shoots a sinister, bluish white flame at the foe to inflict a burn.

flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user shoots a sinister, bluish white flame at the foe to inflict a burn.
